urls.title: Intelligence report warned of coronavirus crisis as early as November: Sources
urls.description: "Analysts concluded it could be a cataclysmic event," a source said.

text:
@JoshNBCNews @PressSec Trump also claims not to have been briefed in a November intelligence report by the military's National Center for Medical Intelligence (NCMI), according to two officials familiar with document’s contents, so Trump's claims now have zero credibility. 

https://t.co/HtrqXFoi1C
